title: Reality Bending (Part 2)
body:
Reality Bending (Part 2)

(Your Shadow Undead is using the Reality Bending Authority to bend reality in accordance with your will.)

As the notification flashed in front of Evan's eyes, a wave of energy engulfed the dead Bullbear's body. All the eyes on Gobu's pot belly lit up, and an object started to materialize in the air above Bullbear's body.

A wave of energy and a large amount of blood flew out of the Bullbear's body and merged with the object. In just a few seconds, a Ruby Red Stone formed above the dead Bullbear's body. Once the stone was formed, Evan grabbed it and examined it.

---) Soul Blood Crystal

"It worked," Evan sighed in relief when he saw the name of the Ruby Red Stone, and a smile appeared on his face.

---) Reality Bending (Authority): Upon activation, you can manipulate the probability of something happening to some extent. This Authority can be used once every two months. (The reality-bending authority can be evolved if certain conditions are met.)
